relevant_findings.appearance: Plethoric appearance; large for gestational age
relevant_findings.reflexes: Moro and grasp reflexes present; no sucking reflex
relevant_findings.insulin_level: 105.5 µU per milliliter (757.0 pmol per liter)

relevant_findings.thumbs: Both thumbs hyperadducted across the palm with an obligate grasp on the left side, suggesting mild corticospinal damage

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thumb position was noted as a new finding on Day 2.

vital_signs.insulin_level: 51.0 µU per milliliter (365.9 pmol per liter)
vital_signs.glucose_level: Less than 20 mg per deciliter (1.1 mmol per liter)

relevant_findings.MRI_brain: Cystic spaces in the white matter adjacent to ventricles; thinner cortex in those areas; small amounts of blood in left ventricle and right occipital cortex

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The glucose level showed persistent hypoglycemia compared to previous values and required increases in glucose infusion.
